com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.picker.color

Class DynamicColorView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.widget.FrameLayout
          • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.picker.color.DynamicColorView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent

    public class DynamicColorView
extends android.widget.FrameLayout
    A FrameLayout to display a color in different DynamicColorShape.

    It will provide various useful methods for the DynamicColorPicker to represent a set of colors and select a color from it.

        Set the shape used by this color view.
        Parameters:
        colorShape - The color shape to be set.

      • isSelected

        public boolean isSelected()
        Returns whether this color view is selected.
        Overrides:

        Returns:
        true if this color view is selected.

      • setSelected

        public void setSelected(boolean selected)
        Set this color view selected or unselected.
        Overrides:
        setSelected in class android.view.View
        Parameters:
        selected - true to make it selected.

      • isAlpha

        public boolean isAlpha()
        Returns whether the alpha is enabled for the color.
        Returns:
        true to enable alpha for the color.

      • setAlpha

        public void setAlpha(boolean alpha)
        Set the alpha support for the color.
        Parameters:
        alpha - true to enable alpha.

      • getCornerRadius

        public int getCornerRadius()
        Get the corner radius for the square or rectangle shape.
        Returns:
        The corner radius for the square or rectangle shape.

      • setCornerRadius

        public void setCornerRadius(int cornerRadius)
        Set the corner radius for the square or rectangle shape.
        Parameters:
        cornerRadius - The corner radius to be set in pixels.

      • getColorString

        public java.lang.String getColorString()
        Returns the hexadecimal color string according to the supplied color.
        Returns:
        The hexadecimal color string according to the supplied color.

        It will return R.string#ads_theme_entry_auto if the color value is Theme.AUTO.

      • getColorString

        public static java.lang.String getColorString(android.content.Context context,
                                              int color,
                                              boolean alpha)
        Returns the hexadecimal color string according to the supplied color.
        Parameters:
        context - The context to retrieve resources.
        color - The color to be converted into string.
        alpha - true to enable alpha string.
        Returns:
        The hexadecimal color string according to the supplied color.

        It will return R.string#ads_theme_entry_auto if the color value is Theme.AUTO.
